name: Aggressive Rhythm
text: While Performing in combat, affected allies gain +2 to damage rolls. While projecting Performative Verse or Performative Chorus, this increases to +3 and +4 respectively.

name: Discerning Insult
text: As a Reaction, reduce a target’s confidence, applying -1d4 to Attack Rolls, Ability Checks, and Saving Throws.

name: Distracting Dissonance
text: While Performing in combat, affected enemies have Armour Class reduced by 1. While projecting Performative Verse or Performative Chorus, this penalty increases to 2 and 3 respectively.

name: Dueling Ditties
text: Add your Bardic Inspiration die to all attack rolls you make without consuming Bardic Inspiration charges.

name: Echoes of Fortitude
text: Upon granting Bardic Inspiration, both you and the target recover 1d6 Hit Points multiplied by your Proficiency Bonus.

name: Encouraging Momentum
text: Upon granting Bardic Inspiration, you and affected targets Dash and Disengage for one turn.

name: Engaging Composition
text: Targets of your Bardic Inspiration may make one additional weapon attack using their Reaction. You may also do so at the cost of one Bardic Inspiration charge. Requires equipped weapon.

name: Guided Inspiration
text: Dealing damage has a 20% chance to apply Bardic Inspiration to allies within 9m/30ft.

name: Harmonious Aura
text: While Performing in combat, affected allies gain +1 to Saving Throws. While projecting Performative Verse or Performative Chorus, this increases to +2 and +3 respectively.

name: Infuriating Amplification
text: While Performing in combat, affected enemies suffer -1 to Saving Throws. While projecting Performative Verse or Performative Chorus, this penalty increases to 2 and 3 respectively.

name: Inspirational Resonance
text: Targets of your Bardic Inspiration emit a shockwave that forces enemies back 9m/30ft.

name: Inspiring Crescendo
text: Add your Bardic Inspiration die to all saving throws you make without consuming Bardic Inspiration charges.

name: Insufferable Curse
text: On a Critical Hit against an enemy with nearby allies, Dominate the target for one turn.

name: Melodic Precision
text: Once per turn, upon landing a Critical Hit, restore one Bardic Inspiration charge.

name: Mobile Maestro
text: Swap places with targets when they gain Bardic Inspiration. This can be toggled.

name: Mocksmith
text: When damaging another creature, potentially afflict them with Vicious Mockery.

name: Silver Tongued Savant
text: Gain Advantage on all Charisma-based Ability Checks.

name: Soothing Words
text: Targets under Bardic Inspiration regain maximum possible healing when below half Hit Points.

name: Unprecedented Encore
text: Targets of your Bardic Inspiration may trigger a positive Wild Magic surge.

name: Vigorously Tuned
text: On your first turn of combat, gain Temporary Hit Points equal to your character level × 4.

name: Adaptive Plating
text: At the beginning of each turn in combat, gain Temporary HP equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

name: Arcane Calibration Matrix
text: Your firearms are incapable of misfiring.

name: Automated Arcane Suppression
text: When an enemy casts a spell, you may expend one round of Ammunition to make a Ranged Weapon Attack against them with your firearm.

name: Castle Defense
text: Deploy Turrets in battle (Bonus Action, at will, 3 turns duration). Turrets cannot move and deal 1d8 damage at level 1, 2d8 at level 5, and 3d8 at level 9.

name: Dead-Zone Calibration
text: The number required to roll a Critical Hit with your firearms is reduced by 1.

name: Elemental Payload
text: When you deal weapon damage, deal an additional 1d4 elemental damage of your choice. You may change the element as a Bonus Action.

name: Emergency Power Cell
text: Once per turn, missing an Attack Roll refunds your Action.

name: Failsafe Injection
text: Once per combat, when starting your turn below 25% HP, consume a synthetic potion that acts as a healing potion.

name: Incendiary Rounds
text: Dealing damage with your firearm causes the target to burn.

name: Kinetic Feedback Loop
text: When an ally is damaged, expend 1 Ammunition and your Reaction to make a Ranged Weapon Attack against their attacker.

name: Like Clockwork
text: Gain +4 to Initiative.

name: Modular Augmentation
text: Grant an ally +2 to AC, Attack Rolls, Damage Rolls, or DC (Bonus Action, permanent). Each effect may only apply to one ally at a time.

name: Nanite Dispersion Field
text: Dealing damage with your firearm throws the target backward 9m.

name: Overclocked
text: When dealing damage, the minimum value you can roll is 4.

name: Precision Rifling
text: Once per turn, landing a Killing Blow or Critical Hit with a Ranged Weapon Attack restores one round of Ammunition.

name: Recoil Compensation
text: Once per turn, landing a Critical Hit with a firearm allows you to expend 1 Ammunition to fire again at the same target.

name: Safeguard
text: Ending your turn grants Blade Ward until the start of your next turn.

name: Speed Loader
text: After landing a Killing Blow, you may Reload as a free action.

name: Synthetic Action Economy
text: Expend your Bonus Action to regain your Action. You cannot use your Bonus Action again until you Short Rest.

name: Vital Aim
text: Landing a Critical Hit with a Ranged Weapon Attack permanently inflicts Gaping Wounds (targets take +1d4 piercing damage whenever damaged).

name: Barbarous Assault
text: While enraged, gain Advantage on all damage rolls.

name: Brutal Critical
text: When you land a Critical Hit, roll an additional damage die.

name: Danger Sense
text: Forcibly succeed any Saving Throw at the cost of one Rage Charge.

name: Death Glare
text: Use your Bonus Action to potentially Intimidate a target (Charisma-based Ability Check).

name: Faceoff
text: If an enemy damages you, use your Reaction to potentially Intimidate them (Charisma-based Ability Check).

name: Furious Criticals
text: While enraged, the number required to roll a Critical Hit is reduced by 1.

name: Land's Stride
text: Difficult Terrain no longer slows you. While enraged, gain the effects of Water Walk.

name: Overwhelming Power
text: While enraged, ignore all physical Resistances when dealing damage.

name: Peak Physicality
text: Gain Advantage on Strength-based Ability Checks and Saving Throws. Strength increases by 2.

name: Rage of the Mountain
text: While enraged, become Enlarged (size +1, weight +100lbs, carry capacity x2, jump +25%, reach x1.5, damage +1d6).

name: Rage of the Undefeated
text: While below 25% HP, make an additional Melee Weapon Attack using your Reaction.

name: Raging Vitality
text: While enraged, recover +1d6 HP per turn (no effect while Downed).

name: Relentless Endurance
text: If you start your turn below half HP, gain total damage Immunity until the start of your next turn (once per Short Rest).

name: Rip and Tear
text: Once per turn, landing a Killing Blow or Critical Hit may Intimidate enemies within 9m (Charisma-based Ability Check).

name: Rooted in Anger
text: At the start of combat, enrage as a free action. If still enraged at combat end, regain one Rage Charge.

name: Tempered Retaliation
text: While enraged, when damaged you may use your Reaction to make a Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack against the attacker.

name: Terrifying Bellow
text: Upon becoming enraged, potentially Intimidate all enemies within 9m (Charisma-based Ability Check).

name: Unrelenting Rampage
text: Upon landing a Killing Blow or Critical Hit, restore +1d12 HP (once per turn).

name: Unfettered Beast
text: Increase Hit Points by 2 per character level.

name: Unstoppable Force
text: While enraged, successful Melee and Throw attacks have a chance to knock targets Prone.

name: Aegis
text: Gain Advantage on all Constitution-based Saving Throws.

name: Blessed Resolve
text: Upon landing a Killing Blow or Critical Hit on a non-allied creature, emit an aura that Blesses all allies within 9m for three turns.

name: Blood for Blood
text: The first time you heal a creature each turn, reduce the number required to roll a Critical Hit by 1. This resets upon landing a Critical Hit.

name: Consecrative Sacrifice
text: Upon landing a Killing Blow or Critical Hit on a non-allied creature, emit a 9m healing aura restoring 1d6 HP × your Proficiency Bonus to yourself and allies (once per turn).

name: Divine Commune
text: Increase the chance of Divine Intervention occurring from 33% to 50%.

name: Divine Restoration
text: At the end of combat, emit a 45m healing aura restoring 1d6 HP × your Proficiency Bonus to yourself and all allies.

name: Ethereal Intuition
text: Permanently gain the effects of Guidance and Resistance.

name: Fell Repentance
text: When an enemy makes an Attack Roll against an ally within 9m, use your Reaction to retaliate with Sacred Flame, Bone Chill, or Spark Surge.

name: Holy Fortitude
text: While below half HP, regain the maximum possible Hit Points when healed.

name: Guided Strikes
text: Upon healing a creature with a Spell, gain Advantage on your next Attack Roll.

name: Immaculate Retribution
text: When damaged by a melee Attack Roll, deal Radiant/Lightning/Necrotic damage equal to your Wisdom Modifier ×2 (damage type depends on subclass).

name: Immaculate Ward
text: When an enemy makes an Attack Roll against you, expend a Reaction and a Channel Divinity charge to gain Immaculate Blade Ward (immunity to next damage instance for one turn).

name: Martyrdom
text: Upon being Downed or killed, erupt in a raging inferno, scorching everything nearby.

name: Paradisiacal Gift
text: Once per turn, upon a Killing Blow or Critical Hit, recover one Channel Divinity charge.

name: Sacral Touch
text: Upon healing a creature, potentially trigger Divine Intervention (once per turn).

name: Sanctified Presence
text: At the beginning of your turn in combat, regain HP equal to Proficiency Bonus ×2.

name: Sanctifying Aura
text: Emit a 9m aura granting Sanctuary to Downed allies.

name: Stalwart
text: Permanently gain the effects of Dispel Evil and Good.

name: Stout Believer
text: Gain immunity to Fear. When healing a creature with a Spell, they receive Death Ward for three turns.

name: Venerational Strikes
text: Upon landing a Killing Blow or Critical Hit, gain Veneration for three turns (weapons deal additional Radiant/Lightning/Necrotic damage equal to your Wisdom Modifier).

name: Armour of Thorns
text: When a creature damages you with a melee Attack Roll, deal Piercing damage equal to your Wisdom Modifier. Also applies to your Dryad if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Combat’s Harvest
text: On your first turn of any combat encounter, cast Goodberry as a 1st-level spell targeting yourself.

name: Earthen Sentinel
text: When you roll a Critical Hit with a spell, Petrify the target for one turn.

name: Feral Precision
text: Gain +2 to all Attack Rolls. Doubled while Wild Shaped, in Shape of the Cosmos, or while Symbiotic Entity is active. Your Dryad gains +4 to Attack Rolls if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Feral Resilience
text: Upon entering a Wild Shape from your natural form, gain Temporary HP equal to your Druid level ×4 (not when swapping forms with Moonbreak).

name: Ferocious Stand
text: Gain +1 Armour Class. Doubled while Wild Shaped, in Shape of the Cosmos, or while Symbiotic Entity is active. Your Dryad gains +2 AC if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Instinctive Defense
text: While Wild Shaped, gain Resistance to all Physical damage. Also applies to your Dryad if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Killer Instinct
text: While Wild Shaped, gain Advantage on all damage rolls. Also applies to your Dryad if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Mantra of Restoration
text: While not Wild Shaped, expend Wild Shape charges with Solar Mend to restore Spell Slots (free action). Also gain Lunar Mend to heal yourself while Wild Shaped.

name: Natural Bounty
text: Once per turn, upon a Killing Blow or Critical Hit, restore one Wild Shape charge. Also applies to your Dryad if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Natural Resurgence
text: While in combat, regenerate Hit Points each turn equal to your Wisdom Modifier (no effect while Downed). Also applies to your Dryad if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Nature’s Mercy
text: Gain Resistance to Cold, Fire, and Lightning damage. Also applies to your Dryad if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Nature’s Wrath
text: Use Wild Shape charges to deal +1d12 Cold, Lightning, or Poison damage on any successful weapon Attack Roll. Also applies to your Dryad if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Pack Leader
text: While Wild Shaped, damaging creatures may Goad them into attacking you. Also applies to your Dryad if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Primal Bloodletter
text: While Wild Shaped, in Shape of the Cosmos, or while Symbiotic Entity is active, successful Attack Rolls have a chance to inflict Gaping Wounds. Also applies to your Dryad if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Primal Surge
text: Deal additional damage while Wild Shaped equal to your Wisdom Modifier. Also applies to your Dryad if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Primal Takedown
text: While Wild Shaped, in Shape of the Cosmos, or while Symbiotic Entity is active, successful Attack Rolls have a chance to knock targets Prone. Also applies to your Dryad if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Shapechanger’s Versatility
text: Outside of combat, you may Wild Shape as a free action (Wild Shape charges are not consumed outside combat).

name: Territorial Dominance
text: Gain Advantage on Attack Rolls against targets in Difficult Terrain. Also applies to your Dryad if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Wild Stride
text: While in combat, regenerate one Wild Shape charge every three turns. Also applies to your Dryad if attuned to Circle of the Land.

name: Aspect of Defiance
text: When damaged below 50% HP, gain Resistance to all physical damage.

name: Challenger’s Call
text: When an ally within 9m is damaged while below 50% HP, use your Reaction to Challenge that enemy and additional enemies within 9m of the aggressor.

name: Charge of the Collective
text: When you are affected by a Dash effect, all allies within 18m also Dash.

name: Duellist
text: Gain +2 to Attack Rolls.

name: Full Arsenal
text: Upon landing a Killing Blow or Critical Hit, restore one Superiority Die (once per turn).

name: Heavy Assault
text: While wielding a Two-Handed Weapon, roll your damage dice with Advantage.

name: Intuitive Warning
text: When an enemy makes an Attack Roll against an ally within 9m, use your Reaction to impose Disadvantage. You must see the attacker.

name: Ironclad
text: You cannot be forcibly moved. Constitution increases by 2.

name: Iron Will
text: On your first turn of combat and after recovering from a Lockdown Condition, gain immunity to all Lockdown Conditions for three turns.

name: Leader’s Momentum
text: Increase Initiative by 2. When Rallying another creature, their Initiative increases by 2 while Rallied.

name: Martial Fortress
text: Once per turn, upon a Killing Blow or Critical Hit, gain Temporary HP equal to character level ×2.

name: Martial Prowess
text: When dealing damage, ignore Slashing Resistance.

name: Merciless
text: When attacking an enemy below 25% HP, deal additional damage equal to Fighter level ×2.

name: Natural Born Leader
text: Once per turn, upon a Critical Hit, immediately Rally (12 Temporary HP) all allies within 9m.

name: Opportunist
text: Successful Opportunity Attacks reduce the target’s Movement Speed to 0.

name: Proper Form
text: When damaged, use your Reaction to reduce the damage by 1d4 × your Proficiency Bonus. You must see the attacker.

name: Reckless Abandon
text: While in combat, restore one Superiority Die every three turns.

name: Sentinel’s Protection
text: When an enemy damages an ally within 3m, use your Reaction to reduce the damage by 1d4 × your Proficiency Bonus. You must see the attacker.

name: Tactical Advantage
text: Increase the reach of basic Melee Attacks, Unarmed Strikes, and Dual-Wield Melee Attacks by 50%.

name: Tenacious Fighter
text: Gain an additional Reaction and Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

name: Counterflow
text: When an enemy fails to damage you with a Melee Weapon Attack, use your Reaction and a Ki Point to retaliate with Flurry of Blows.

name: Critical Flow
text: On a Critical Hit, restore one Ki Point (once per turn).

name: Dance of Flowing Water
text: On a successful Attack Roll, gain +1 Armour Class until you avoid an attack. Stacks and resets at the start of your turn.

name: Deflective Missiles
text: When targeted by a Ranged Weapon Attack, use your Reaction to reduce damage by 1d12 + Dexterity Modifier + character level. If reduced to 0, you may spend a Ki Point to throw it back.

name: Dexterous Ward
text: When an effect deals half damage on a successful Dexterity Saving Throw, take no damage on success and half on failure.

name: Fist of Crushing Rock
text: When a creature fails an Attack Roll against you, gain +1 to Attack Rolls on your next turn. Stacks and resets at end of turn.

name: Focused Stream
text: On a successful Attack Roll, reduce the number required for a Critical Hit by 1. Stacks and resets at end of turn.

name: Fortified Body and Mind
text: Gain immunity to being Charmed, Frightened, or Restrained.

name: Harmonious Barrage
text: Flurry of Blows deals additional damage equal to your Wisdom Modifier.

name: Harmonious Footwork
text: Increase Movement Speed by 9m.

name: Martial Empowerment
text: On a Killing Blow, restore one Ki Point (once per turn).

name: Mystic Strikes
text: Ignore Bludgeoning Resistance when dealing damage.

name: Opportune Reversal
text: When an enemy fails to damage you with a Melee Weapon Attack, use your Reaction to retaliate with an Unarmed Strike.

name: Resonance of Body
text: While in combat, regenerate one Ki Point every three turns.

name: Sagacious Resilience
text: Gain Advantage on Wisdom-based Saving Throws.

name: Soused Rempart
text: While Inebriated or Tipsy, gain +2 Armour Class.

name: Tempestuous Reprise
text: When an enemy attacks an ally within 9m, use your Reaction to retaliate with air pressure dealing Unarmed Strike damage and pushing them 4.5m if they fail a Strength Save.

name: Tranquil Fortitude
text: Gain an additional Reaction and Patient Defense (Bonus Action: attacks against you have Disadvantage; you gain Advantage on Dexterity Saves for 1 turn).

name: Windwaker
text: Gain Step of the Wind: Dash and Disengage. May be cast once per turn as a free action.

name: Zen Recovery
text: On a Killing Blow or Critical Hit, expend your Reaction to restore your Bonus Action.

name: Atonement
text: Upon expending a Channel Oath charge, you have a 33% chance to recover a Crusader’s Smite charge. Upon expending a Crusader’s Smite charge, you have a 33% chance to recover a Channel Oath charge.

name: Critical Oath
text: Once per turn, upon landing a Critical Hit, restore one Channel Oath charge.

name: Death Sentence
text: Each turn, you have a 33% chance to recover a Crusader’s Smite charge.

name: Divine Health
text: Gain Resistance to Poison and Necrotic damage. Upon killing an enemy, heal for 1d6 × Proficiency Bonus.

name: Divine Resurgence
text: While in combat, restore one Crusader Smite charge every three turns.

name: Divine Sense
text: Gain Advantage on Attack Rolls against Fey, Fiends, Undead, and Aberrations.

name: Divine Shielding
text: When taking physical damage, gain Resistance to that damage type for 3 rounds.

name: Holy Smite
text: When dealing damage with Smite, heal all allies (including yourself) within 3m for the value of your Smite’s damage.

name: Holy Wrath
text: When dealing damage with Smite, gain Divine Favor and Shield of Faith for three turns.

name: Infaillible Beacon
text: In combat, enemies within 9m suffer a -1d4 penalty to Attack Rolls if they are not attacking you.

name: Lay on Hands
text: Expend a Crusader Smite charge to heal yourself or an ally, or cure poison (1d12 HP per 2 levels, Bonus Action, melee range).

name: Oathbound Renewal
text: While in combat, restore one Channel Oath charge every three turns.

name: Oath Channeling
text: Spend Channel Oath charges to restore Spell Slots (Free Action once per turn; 1 charge restores 1 slot).

name: Principle of Belief
text: When damaging Fey, Fiends, Undead, or Aberrations, deal an additional +1d12 Radiant damage (damage type may change based on subclass).

name: Repel the Damned
text: Enemies within 9m take damage each turn equal to your Charisma Modifier (damage type may change based on subclass).

name: Resplendent Reverb
text: When healing another creature with a Spell, heal yourself for Charisma Modifier × Proficiency Bonus.

name: Smite Makes Right
text: Once per turn, when killing an enemy with Smite, restore one Channel Oath charge.

name: Stalwart Eruption
text: When killing an enemy with Smite, gain Heroism for three turns.

name: Stalwart Resolve
text: Reduce elemental damage taken by your Charisma Modifier.

name: Visage of Sanctity
text: Gain a bonus to Ability Checks equal to your Charisma Modifier.

name: Ambush Breaker
text: Gain +2 Initiative and can no longer be Surprised.

name: Ballistic Infusion
text: Upcast arrows using Spell Slots, dealing +1d12 Force damage per Spell Slot level spent.

name: Beastbond’s Precision
text: Gain +4 to Ranged Weapon Attack Rolls. Ranger Companions also gain +4 to their Attack Rolls.

name: Bestial Foresight
text: Outside combat, summon your Ranger Companion without consuming Natural Focus charges.

name: Blood Bond
text: Your Ranger Companion gains Resistance to all Physical damage (Bear Companion already has this).

name: Bounty Hunter
text: Bounty targets grant bonus gold when killed. Gain Advantage on Attack Rolls against targets with bounties.

name: Close Quarters Shooter
text: While Threatened by one enemy, ranged attacks against them do not suffer Disadvantage and roll damage with Advantage.

name: Escapist
text: You no longer provoke Opportunity Attacks.

name: Explosive Arrowheads
text: Ranged attacks deal Force damage equal to Proficiency Bonus ×2 in a 3m area around the target (not the initial target). Toggleable.

name: Hidden Inventory
text: Once per turn, upon a Killing Blow or Critical Hit, restore one Natural Focus charge.

name: Marksman’s Edge
text: Weapon damage has a chance to inflict Bleeding.

name: Multi-Attack Defense
text: When attacked, additional Attack Rolls against you have Disadvantage until the attacker’s next turn.

name: Natural Huntsman
text: Making an Attack Roll grants +2 to additional Attack Rolls that turn. Stacks.

name: Natural Opportunity
text: Gain an additional Reaction. Opportunity Attacks hit with both weapons while dual-wielding.

name: Protective Bond
text: Ranger Companions gain +4 Armour Class.

name: Sniper
text: Ranged Weapon Attacks deal +1 Piercing damage per 3m distance to target (max +6).

name: Superior Technique
text: Ignore Piercing Resistance when dealing damage.

name: Sure Shot
text: Reduce the number required to score a Critical Hit with Ranged Weapon Attacks by 1.

name: Two-Weapon Fighting
text: Off-hand weapon Attack Rolls and damage rolls are rolled with Advantage.

name: Wanton Synergy
text: Once per turn, on a Critical Hit, your Ranger Companion’s next damage is also a Critical Hit (within 18m).

name: Cunning Fangs
text: Throw a dagger (18m range, 1d6 damage per 2 character levels, piercing) as a Bonus Action. Counts as a ranged throwing unarmed attack roll and can trigger Sneak Attack.

name: Cutthroat
text: On a Critical Hit, roll an additional damage die.

name: Elusive Retreat
text: Upon landing a Killing Blow or Critical Hit, immediately Dash and Disengage.

name: Elusive Shadow
text: Upon landing a Killing Blow or Critical Hit, you may Hide once without expending resources.

name: Fast Hands
text: Gain Advantage on Dexterity-based Ability Checks.

name: Fatal Manoeuvre
text: While Sneaking or Invisible, reduce the number required to roll a Critical Hit by 1.

name: Grievous Wounds
text: Sneak Attacks halve the target’s Movement Speed and prevent them from using Reactions.

name: Illusory Advantage
text: Gain Enhanced Illusion (Bonus Action, 18m range): create an Illusory Decoy that blinds nearby enemies upon vanishing.

name: Light Footwork
text: Gain the effects of Freedom of Movement.

name: Low Visibility
text: While obscured in shadow, Armour Class increases by 2.

name: Manipulator
text: Gain Advantage on Deception and Persuasion checks. At the start of your turn, 50% chance to gain a Luck Point (scales with rogue level 5).

name: Now You See Me
text: When an enemy fails a Melee Weapon Attack against you, spend your Reaction to deal your attack damage and Blind them for the rest of their turn.

name: Quick Reflexes
text: Gain an additional Reaction. Opportunity Attacks inflict Haemorrhaged (1d8 piercing damage per tick) for 3 turns.

name: Reactive Movement
text: Gain the ability to Dash, Disengage, and Hide as a Reaction. Toggleable.

name: Sharp Eyes
text: Add +20 to Perception and Insight Ability Checks.

name: Spectre
text: While Sneaking or Invisible, teleport up to 9m. Warp is not limited by line of sight.

name: Spectral Hunter
text: Upon Sneaking or becoming Invisible, all enemies within 9m are afflicted with Hunter’s Mark.

name: Umbral Sight
text: Gain Superior Darkvision and the ability to see within Magical Darkness.

name: Vanishing Act
text: When an enemy fails an Attack Roll against you, spend your Reaction to become Invisible until the end of your turn.

name: Venomous
text: Weapon damage has a chance to apply Wyvern Poison (1d8 poison damage at the start of target’s next round). DC is INT-based.

name: Arcane Overflow
text: On a Killing Blow or Critical Hit, generate one Sorcery Point (once per turn).

name: Arcane Oppression
text: After using Sorcery Channeling or Spell Channeling, enemies within 9m roll with Disadvantage when resisting your Spells.

name: Arcane Reservoir
text: Once per turn, casting a Spell generates one Sorcery Point.

name: Charismatic Infusion
text: After using Sorcery or Spell Channeling, Spells add your Charisma Modifier to damage rolls.

name: Charismatic Shield
text: Gain Resistance to all damage while you have Sorcery Points. Taking damage consumes one Sorcery Point. Toggleable.

name: Dormant Charge
text: While Threatened, increase Cantrip and Spell damage by your Proficiency Bonus.

name: Elemental Afterglow
text: Elemental Spell damage applies a matching status effect in a 9m radius (Acid: Acid, Cold: Frostbite, Fire: Burning, Force: Pull, Lightning: Shocked, Necrotic: Bone Chill, Poison: Poisoned, Psychic: Mind Sliver, Thunder: Push, Radiant: Radiating Orb). Toggleable.

name: Enchanting Influence
text: Increase your Spell Save DC by 1.

name: Ephemeral Vacuum
text: Expend two Sorcery Points to pull all creatures to a chosen point.

name: Essential Epiphany
text: Gain Astral Knowledge (Bonus Action: proficiency in all skills of one Ability Score until Long Rest).

name: Evasive Warp
text: When you or an ally are attacked within 18m, swap positions of target and aggressor as a free Reaction.

name: Latent Acuity
text: On a Killing Blow, gain Arcane Acuity for three turns.

name: Misty Escape
text: If you start your turn Threatened, cast Misty Step without expending a Spell Slot.

name: Mystic Empowerment
text: If you roll with Advantage on Spell Attack Rolls or Saving Throws, roll Spell damage with Advantage as well.

name: Natural Vortex
text: When a creature within 18m casts a Spell, generate two stacks of Sorcerous Overflow instead of one.

name: Reactive Blood
text: When damaged by an enemy, generate one stack of Sorcerous Overflow.

name: Shared Creation
text: Creationary can now target allies.

name: Sorcerous Acumen
text: Expend one Sorcery Point to gain Advantage on any Ability Check.

name: Sorcerous Focus
text: After using Spell or Sorcery Channeling, gain Advantage on Spell Attack Rolls for the rest of your turn.

name: Veiled Synergy
text: Gain Arcane Synergy by expending one Sorcery Point per turn while in combat. Toggleable.

name: Bane of the Pact
text: Eldritch Blast applies Bane for 3 turns. Toggleable. Only one Eldritch Boon may modify Eldritch Blast at a time.

name: Binding Transposition
text: On a successful Eldritch Blast hit against a Large or smaller creature, swap places with them. Toggleable. Only one Eldritch Boon may modify Eldritch Blast at a time.

name: Bound Elements
text: After casting a Spell, use a Free Reaction to gain Resistance to all damage for one turn.

name: Bound Compulsion
text: Once per turn, upon a Killing Blow or Critical Hit, enemies within 9m must succeed a Wisdom Save or be Compelled to duel you on their next turn.

name: Curse of Hellfire
text: On a successful melee Attack Roll, apply a stack of Curse of Hellfire (1d4 fire per round, duration stacks). Advantage against the target.

name: Dark Retaliation
text: When an enemy fails an Attack Roll against you, spend your Reaction to cast Darkness. While Heavily Obscured, Chained Companions gain Advantage on Attack Rolls.

name: Devil’s Sight
text: See normally in magical and non-magical darkness up to 18m.

name: Eldritch Enervation
text: Eldritch Blast damage heals you equal to your Charisma Modifier.

name: Eldritch Lance
text: Fire a piercing variant of Eldritch Blast dealing 1d12 Force per spell level at the cost of one Warlock Spell Slot. Modifiers apply to both.

name: Eldritch Strike
text: Channel Eldritch Blast into your main-hand weapon (cost: 1 Spell Slot). On hit, fire a Beam at an enemy within 18m.

name: Hellish Rebuttal
text: When an enemy fails a melee Attack Roll against you, gain True Strike as a Free Reaction. Chained Companions ignore Resistance.

name: Hellbound Vision
text: Eldritch Blast Blinds the target for 1 turn. Toggleable. Only one Eldritch Boon may modify Eldritch Blast at a time.

name: Luck of the Devil
text: Once per turn, upon a Critical Hit, restore one Warlock Spell Slot.

name: Master of Chaos
text: Eldritch Blast may trigger a negative Wild Magic surge. Radiant Eldritch Blast may trigger a positive surge under Pact of Penumbra.

name: One with Shadows
text: On a Killing Blow or Critical Hit, you and Chained Companions within 18m become Invisible for 3 turns.

name: Onus Hematic
text: Hematic Invocation restores 2 Spell Slots instead of 1.

name: Pact Stricken
text: On a successful Melee Weapon Attack, apply one stack of Eldritch Inertia.

name: Repelling Blast
text: Eldritch Blast pushes targets up to 9m. Toggleable. Only one Eldritch Boon may modify Eldritch Blast at a time.

name: Resilient Servitude
text: Increase HP by character level ×2. Chained Companions gain +4 AC.

name: Shade Walker
text: Teleport up to 9m at will as a Bonus Action.

name: Arcane Interruption
text: Use your Reaction to interrupt any Spell. Doing so reduces your maximum Arcane Recovery charges by 1 until your next Long Rest.

name: Arcane Reverb
text: When damaged by a melee Attack Roll, release a shockwave that pushes nearby enemies 9m.

name: Arcane Shield
text: While Concentrating, gain Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.

name: Boon of Plumes
text: Emit a 9m aura granting Feather Fall to you and allies. Effects persist one turn after leaving the aura.

name: Edict of Divinity
text: After a Long Rest, gain three random Portent Dice. Use your Reaction and Arcane Recovery to replace nearby Attack Rolls or Saving Throws with a Portent Die. Spent dice may be regained via Prophecies.

name: Elemental Countercharge
text: When an enemy fails a Melee Weapon Attack against you, use your Reaction to retaliate with Shocking Grasp.

name: Enchanted Safeguard
text: Expend an Arcane Recovery charge to cast Shield as a Reaction (+4 AC for one round).

name: Flames Riposte
text: When an enemy fails an Attack Roll against you, use your Reaction to retaliate with Firebolt.

name: Illusory Phantasm
text: On your first turn of combat, immediately gain Mirror Image.

name: Magical Insight
text: Gain Advantage on Intelligence-based Ability Checks and Saving Throws. Add your Intelligence Modifier to Charisma-based Skill Checks.

name: Mystic Override
text: Ignore elemental Resistances when dealing damage.

name: Potent Cantrips
text: Cantrips deal additional damage equal to Proficiency Bonus ×2.

name: Potent Spells
text: Spells gain bonus damage equal to 4 × Spell Slot level used.

name: Spellblade
text: Use your Spellcasting Ability Modifier for weapon Attack Rolls and damage. Killing Blow or Critical Hit restores one Arcane Recovery charge.

name: Spellbound Rebirth
text: On a Killing Blow or Critical Hit, restore one Arcane Recovery charge (once per turn).

name: Spell Surge
text: While in combat, regenerate one Arcane Recovery charge every three turns.

name: Telekinetic Command
text: Gain Telekinetic Push and Pull (18m range, 9m movement on failed Strength Save). Once per turn, use as a free action.

name: War Magic
text: After making a melee Attack Roll or casting a Spell, cast one Cantrip as a Bonus Action. Toggleable.

name: Wizard’s Clarity
text: After spending Arcane Recovery charges, gain Advantage on Spell and Cantrip damage rolls for a duration equal to the Spell Slot level recovered.

name: Woven Precision
text: Reduce the number required to roll a Critical Hit with Spells and Cantrips by 1.
